name: Ninja Knockout
description:
In Ninja Knockout you play as Cindy, she lives in the quiet town and takes the train to work in Tokio. Cindy is packed with power, fury and is not afraid to fight the ninjas head on! Your objective: try to defend yourself and knock out as many ninjas as you can!

For a free "Cindy Karate Suit" sent a DM to @hdgamestudios on instagram
